sentence: And No Labels “will host an unprecedented bipartisan response” from Republican Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick and Democratic Rep. Josh Gottheimer, co-chairs of the House Problem Solvers Caucus (which creates more problems than it solves).

title: and the economy in first State of the Union
